slug.description: A human friendly string used in the URL.

first_name.description: The first name of the attendee.

last_name.description: The last name of the attendee.

registration_id.description: The id of the `Registration` this ticket was created from.

consented_at.description: The date the attendee consented to providing their information.

discount_code_used.description: The code of `DiscountCode` used when purchasing.

created_at.description: The date the ticket was created.

updated_at.description: The date the ticket was last updated.

assigned.description: Whether the ticket has been assigned to an individual's email address

price_less_tax.description: The net price paid for this ticket minus any tax.

total_paid.description: The gross price paid for this ticket including any upgrades

total_tax_paid.description: The tax paid for this ticket.

total_paid_less_tax.description: The net price paid including upgrades.

upgrade_ids.description: An array of the IDs of `Upgrade` attached to the release.

release_id.description: The `id` of the `Release` attached to the ticket.

responses.description:
The answer to each `Question` attached to the ticket. Format: A hash of answers, keyed by `Question` slug e.g.
`{ "t-shirt-size": "Medium" }`

company_name.description: The company name of the attendee.

email.description: The email address of the attendee.

name.description: The full name of the attendee.

number.description: Default: Starts at 1 and counts up with each ticket registered.

phone_number.description: The phone number of the attendee.

price.description: The price paid for this ticket without any upgrades.

reference.description: Default: The order reference plus the index of the ticket in that order e.g. `AXBY-1`.

tags.description: A comma separated list of tags for the ticket.

temporary.description: Is the ticket temporary or not. For example if a ticket needs to be assigned but is not yet confirmed e.g. a payment is pending. Default: `false`.

test_mode.description: Default: `true` if test mode is enabled for you or for your entire event, otherwise `false`.

answers_attributes.description: An array of updated answers to questions for this ticket. The attributes `id`, `question_id`, `primary_response`, `file`, `alternate_response` and an array of `responses` should be given.
